content: 2006 Singaporean film ***Zodiac: The Race Begins*** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 生肖传奇) is a [CGI](/wiki/Computer_generated_imagery) [film](/wiki/Film) produced by [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)'s Cubix Pictures. The film was released in the city state on January 26, 2006. It is Singapore's first [3D animated](/wiki/3D_animation) film and recounts the legend behind the ancient [Chinese zodiac](/wiki/Chinese_zodiac) on how 12 [animals](/wiki/Animal) came to be chosen as its symbols. Its script, researched by Singapore-based freelance [playwright](/wiki/Playwright) and former cross-talk [celebrity](/wiki/Celebrity) Zhao Jin, incorporates eight myths. In 2007, it was released in Malaysia and the Philippines on [Disney Channel Asia](/wiki/Disney_Channel_(Southeast_Asia)) in English. ## Cast 35 artists were cast in the voiceovers for the show. This includes prominent Singaporean actress [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) and popular Singaporean DJ [Dennis Chew](/wiki/Dennis_Chew). - [Dennis Chew](/wiki/Dennis_Chew) as the [Rooster](/wiki/Rooster_(zodiac)), the [Rat](/wiki/Rat_(zodiac)), Evil court official - [Tom Arnold](/wiki/Tom_Arnold_(actor)) as Ringo the Rat (American English) - [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) as the [Snake](/wiki/Snake_(zodiac)) - [Jamie Yeo](/wiki/Jamie_Yeo) - [Vernetta Lopez](/wiki/Vernetta_Lopez) - Colin Gomez ## Critical response Brian Costello of [Common Sense Media](/wiki/Common_Sense_Media) gave this film a 1/5 stars, writing that the film "is rife with unlistenable songs, unlikeable characters, terrible acting, and the thinnest of storylines". - Zodiac: The Race Begins - *Zodiac: The Race Begins* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - *Today Online* (PDF) - Article at Twitch This article about an [animated film](/wiki/Animated_film) of the 2000s is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article related to a Singaporean film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Zodiac: The Race Begins
